pr_title: [nanoleaf] Fixed canvas color setting (identical to triangles)

timeline.message:
[nanoleaf] Fixed canvas color setting (identical to triangles)

Signed-off-by: Stefan Höhn <stefan@andreaundstefanhoehn.de>

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        logger.debug("currentPanelColor: {}, received a {} command", currentPanelColor.toString(), command.getClass());
```

and please remove  the other log-statements (except the last one)
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
logger.debug("currentPanelColor: {}", currentPanelColor.toString());
logger.debug("currentPanelColor: {}, received a {} command", currentPanelColor.toString(), command.getClass());

and please remove the other log-statements (except the last one)
timeline.author: J-N-K
